mapper.select: select * from champion_info order by champion_info_name asc

select ci.* from champion_info ci, (select * from (select CHAMPION_INFO_KEY cik ,MATCH_GAME_POSITION,count(1) cnt from(select MATCH_TIER,MATCH_GAME_WIN,CHAMPION_INFO_KEY,MATCH_GAME_POSITION from match_info,match_game_info where match_id = match_game_id) GROUP BY CHAMPION_INFO_KEY,MATCH_GAME_POSITION order by CHAMPION_INFO_KEY) where MATCH_GAME_POSITION = #{matchGamePosition} and cnt > 5) where ci.champion_info_key = cik order by champion_info_name asc
mapper.insert: insert into champion_info() values( #{championInfoId},#{championInfoName},#{championInfoKey}) ON CONFLICT (champion_info_key) DO UPDATE SET champion_info_id = EXCLUDED.champion_info_id, champion_info_name = EXCLUDED.champion_info_name
